reg:regulation.reg:title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 23

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The transfer to 1007717 B.C. Ltd., Inc. No. BC1007717, of the property described below on October 2, 2014 is exempt from tax payable under the Property Transfer Tax Act:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: Lot A, Section 1, Wellington District, Plan 36715, PID 000-421-839.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: This section is retroactive to October 1, 2014, with effect on and after that date.
The transfers to 1007716 B.C. Ltd., Inc. No. BC1007716, of the properties described below on March 16, 2015 are exempt from tax payable under the Property Transfer Tax Act:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: Lot 1 of an un-numbered portion of Douglas District Plan EPP39726, except that part in Plan EPP47148, PID 029-462-681;
Lot 2 of an un-numbered portion of Douglas District Plan EPP39726, PID 029-462-703;
Lot 3 of an un-numbered portion of Douglas District Plan EPP39726, PID 029-462-720;
Block A of Block 202, Douglas District as shown on Plan EPP42601, PID 029-508-771;
Block A of Block 271, Douglas District as shown on Plan EPP42601, PID 029-508-762.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: This section is retroactive to March 15, 2015, with effect on and after that date.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Property Transfer Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 378, section 37 (2) (b) and (3)]
